mapper.sql: id, username, password, email, is_expired, is_locked, is_enabled, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user
mapper.select: select a.code from (select p.code from t_user u,t_user_role ur,t_role r,t_role_permission rp,t_permission p,t_permission_resource pres,t_resource res where u.id=ur.user_id and ur.role_id=r.id and r.id = rp.role_id and rp.permission_id=p.id and p.id = pres.permission_id and pres.resource_id=res.id and u.username=#{username}) as a , (select p.code from t_user u,t_user_group ug,t_group g,t_group_permission gp ,t_permission p,t_permission_resource pres,t_resource res where u.id=ug.user_id and ug.group_id=g.id and g.id = gp.group_id and gp.permission_id=p.id and p.id = pres.permission_id and pres.resource_id=res.id and u.username=#{username}) as b WHERE a.code=b.code
